suncertify.gui
Interface ValidityChangeListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface ValidityChangeListener
extends java.util.EventListener

A listener responding to a change of validity of the text in a CheckedTextField. With the validity changing while text is being entered into the checked text field, other controls may be activated or deactivated automatically in an event-driven manner.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lars Kuettner

Method Summary
 void validityGained(ValidityChangeEvent e)
          Fired at the moment when the validity of the text in a CheckedTextField changes from invalid to valid according to the employed TextChecker implementation.
 void validityLost(ValidityChangeEvent e)
          Fired at the moment when the validity of the text in a CheckedTextField changes from valid to invalid according to the employed TextChecker implementation.
 

Method Detail

validityGained

void validityGained(ValidityChangeEvent e)
Fired at the moment when the validity of the text in a CheckedTextField changes from invalid to valid according to the employed TextChecker implementation.

Parameters:
e - the validity change event being fired

validityLost

void validityLost(ValidityChangeEvent e)
Fired at the moment when the validity of the text in a CheckedTextField changes from valid to invalid according to the employed TextChecker implementation.

Parameters:
e - the validity change event being fired
